artist: Artist: Utagawa Hiroshige; Publisher: Sanoya Kihei
catalogue_raissonne: Ukiyo-e shūka 14 (1981), Hiroshige list, p. 247, horizontal ōban #11.12
description: group of ladies in foreground beneath a blue gateway; stooped old man, LLC; groups of figures of various ages in middle ground; trees at rights; buildings at left and center; water in background
inscription: URQ, in black: untranslated inscriptions; on back, in pencil: [S UK1716], [$15.00] and [181839]
markings: LRQ in right margin, and in URQ, stamped in red: Sanoki, kiwame
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Famous Places in Edo (Kōto meisho 江都名所)
title: Tomigaoka Hachiman Shrine at Fukagawa
